Name: Game Set Match
Ingredients: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of half lemon slice & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry on stick.
Review: A Sweet Manhattan with Cynar and orange bitters. What's not to like?
History: Created in 2013 by Juan 'J.P.' Caceres-Rojas while working in Washington D.C., USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Game Set Match contains 172 calories
